definition: to scrape/to blow/to shave/to plunder/to extort
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: Add in coconut shreds and hazelnut powder.
sentences.chinese: 加入椰絲和榛子粉，用橡膠刮刀撈拌均勻。

sentences.english: The OXO Squeegee is useful in almost every room in your home.
sentences.chinese: 在羰基合成刮刀是有用的幾乎每一個在你家的空間。

sentences.english: Some of the grid sections will accumulate immediately in the trowel areas.
sentences.chinese: 有些板柵碎塊可能立即堆積在刮刀的地方。

sentences.english: Squeegee is useful in almost every room in your home.
sentences.chinese: 在羰基合成刮刀是有用的幾乎每一個在你家的空間。

sentences.english: Scraper to prevent mud build up on wheel.
sentences.chinese: 刮刀，以防止泥土建立車輪。

sentences.english: The machine is equipped with scraper and wind up unit. The reclaimed rubber may be taken off from the winding-up roller.
sentences.chinese: 本機設有刮刀和卷取裝置，可將料從卷輥上取下。

sentences.english: Change the squeegee blade if it’s nicked, sliced or worn.
sentences.chinese: 如果刀片出現刻痕，那麼請立刻更換刮刀刀片。

sentences.english: The setting between the doctor blade and the engraved gravure cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 中義墨槽刮刀與凹版輥筒間角度的設定值。

sentences.english: Then zip the stuff off the wall with a wallpaper scraper.
sentences.chinese: 然後用刮刀把牆紙從牆上弄下來。

sentences.english: Manual vision alignment and dual squeegee head options available.
sentences.chinese: 人工視覺調準和雙刮刀頭可供選擇。

definition: abbr. for 低筋麵粉|低筋面粉[di1 jin1 mian4 fen3]
